name: .C3DP File Extension
summary: Learn about .C3DP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open C3DP files with Crocotile 3D. To open a C3DP file, select Scene â†’ Import Prefab Object.
Since C3DP files store plain text information, you can also open them with a text editor. However, opening them with a text editor will not display the same results as opening them with Crocotile 3D.
